summary: This bill, H.R. 2660, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt qualified student loan bonds from the volume cap and the alternative minimum tax. The bill modifies sections 146(g), 149(f)(6), and 57(a)(5)(C) of the Code to achieve this exemption, including special rules for pooled financing bonds and conforming amendments. The changes apply to obligations issued after the date of the Act's enactment.
